task.name: clearstat
task.description:
This task is useful if another task that is running indicates that it is trying to obtain a lock on a file.
Typing 'go clearstat()' will not change the current task being scrutinized Typing 'clearstat()' will change the current task assignment to clearpstat which is generally not what is desired.
task.example:
For more information, see the task pages of clearstat in CASA Docs:
https://casa.nrao.edu/casadocs/
